attributes.action: Scrap Road Tax and Road Pricing but increase fuel tax to cover the loss.  Thus basing driving costs directly against ecological costs to the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would make people buy more environmentally friendly cars and drive less.

Tax could be reclaimed for industrial use, i.e. delivery companies, farms, company cars etc.  To allow necessary transport to continue.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap Road Tax and Road Pricing but increase fuel tax to cover the loss. Thus basing driving costs directly against ecological costs to the environment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11142.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/roadandfueltax/
